query: SELECT supervisor_district, analysis_neighborhood, date_trunc_ym(buyout_agreement_date) AS month, SUM(buyout_amount) AS total_buyout_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_agreements WHERE buyout_agreement_date >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY supervisor_district, analysis_neighborhood, month ORDER BY month, supervisor_district, analysis_neighborhood

column_metadata.description: District Number - San Francisco Board of Supervisors (1 to 11).
Analysis neighborhoods corresponding to census boundaries.
The amount of the buyout offered by the landlord.

table_metadata.title: Buyout Agreements
table_metadata.description: Contains buyout declarations and buyout agreements filed at the Rent Board, regulating 'buyout agreements' between landlords and tenants to vacate rent-controlled units.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Housing policy makers, tenant rights groups, city housing authorities

whom_it_may_interest: Researchers, city planners, and anyone interested in housing and district-based analysis
title: Buyout Agreements
